= Introduction =

This is a thebeast tutorial.

= Download =

Go to "Source" and use svn for now

= compile =

ant -f thebeast.xml

bin/linux/thebeast 

= Defining a model =

== Types ==

type Slot: From_loc, "to_loc";
type Word: ... "a", "man";

== Predicates ==

predicate slot: Int x Slot;
predicate word: Int x Word;
